topic: Text-to-Image Model Safety and Fairness Analysis

  entities:
    SneakyPrompt|Method
    Dall-E-3|Model
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|Model
    CogView-3-Plus|Model
    HunyuanDiT|Model
    Playground-v2.5|Model
    Kolors|Model
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|Model
    SD-3.5-large|Model
    ViSAGe|Dataset
    Facet|Tool
    Fair Diffusion|Method
    VLM-as-a-Judge|Method

  proposition: Adversarial prompt engineering techniques like SneakyPrompt are not considered scalable solutions for generating NSFW content.
    entity-entity relationships:
    SneakyPrompt|TARGETS|NSFW Content Generation

  proposition: SneakyPrompt relies on strategically perturbing prompts to bypass LLM safety mechanisms.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    SneakyPrompt|TECHNIQUE|strategically perturbing prompts
    SneakyPrompt|GOAL|bypass safety mechanisms

  proposition: NSFW Image Generation Percentages by Model:
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Dall-E-3|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|94%
    FLUX-1.1-Pro|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|73.5%
    CogView-3-Plus|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|71%
    HunyuanDiT|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|64%
    Playground-v2.5|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|62.5%
    Kolors|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|60%
    SD-3.5-large-turbo|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|53%
    SD-3.5-large|NSFW_GENERATION_RATE|47%

  proposition: T2I models often perpetuate stereotypes about certain groups.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-Image Models|CHARACTERISTIC|stereotype perpetuation

  proposition: Significant gender bias exists, particularly against non-cisgender individuals.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Text-to-Image Models|BIAS_TYPE|gender bias

  proposition: ViSAGe dataset helps analyze global-scale stereotypes in T2I models.
    entity-entity relationships:
    ViSAGe|ANALYZES|Text-to-Image Models
    ViSAGe|FOCUSES_ON|global-scale stereotypes

  proposition: Facet is a tool for assessing image fairness.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Facet|PURPOSE|assess image fairness

  proposition: Fair Diffusion addresses bias by diversifying human input instructions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Fair Diffusion|TECHNIQUE|diversifying human input instructions
    Fair Diffusion|GOAL|address bias

  proposition: The evaluation uses anonymized group entity descriptions.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Benchmark Evaluation|METHOD|anonymized group entity descriptions

  proposition: Models generate images multiple times (3 times in this experiment).
    entity-attribute relationships:
    Benchmark Evaluation|GENERATION_FREQUENCY|3 times

  proposition: VLM-as-a-Judge assesses entity appearance in generated images.
    entity-attribute relationships:
    VLM-as-a-Judge|PURPOSE|assess entity appearance

NSFW Topics:
  - Self-harm or Suicide
  - Sexual content
  - Gore and Violence
  - Hate images
  - Drugs and Illegal Activities
  - Horror images

Fairness Concerns:
  - Gender bias
  - Racial stereotypes
  - Regional biases
  - Demographic stereotypes
  - Cultural preference biases
